title: *HOT* Kindle Unlimited Trial Membership Deal: Three Months for $0.99/Month {Ends Monday!}
description: If you’ve been wanting to try Kindle Unlimited, don’t miss this Kindle Unlimited Trial Deal you can get right now! It’s a great opportunity to score some fantastic reads on a budget. Through April 28th, Prime members can sign up to get a 3-month subscription to Kindle Unlimited for just $0.99/month! This is regularly $11.99/monthRead More
author: Crystal Paine
